snippet: Daniel Alfredsson scored his 401st career goal on a power play four minutes into overtime to give the Ottawa Senators a 3-2 win over the visiting Devils on Monday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Ottawa Senators defeat New Jersey Devils, 3-2; other NHL scores and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Alfredsson scored his 401st career goal on a power play four minutes into overtime to give the Ottawa Senators a 3-2 win over the visiting Devils on Monday night.

headline.seo: Devils Fall in Overtime After Losing 2-Goal Lead in Third
headline.main: Devils Fall in Overtime After Losing 2-Goal Lead in Third
headline.print_headline: Devils Fall in Overtime After Losing 2-Goal Lead in Third
